generations.text:
Pizza King
Brooklyn, NY
"Cheap. Hot. Now."

SIGNATURES — OUR BEST
Brooklyn Classic ................................ $12 (small) / $18 (large)
Classic thin-crust tomato, gooey mozzarella, basil and a charred crust — the slice locals crave.

Spicy King ...................................... $13 / $20
Pepperoni, hot honey drizzle and Calabrian chili flakes for a sweet-heat Brooklyn kick.

White Garlic Supreme .......................... $12 / $18 (V)
Ricotta, roasted garlic, mozzarella and oregano — creamy, garlicky, and oven-browned.

Veggie Supreme ............................... $11 / $17 (V)
Bell peppers, mushrooms, red onion, spinach and house marinara — big flavor, all vegetarian.

Buffalo Chicken King .......................... $13 / $19
Grilled chicken tossed in buffalo sauce, ranch swirl and shredded mozzarella.

Grandma Square ............................... $15 (large)
Rustic pan pizza with thick focaccia-style crust, San Marzano sauce, fresh basil and olive oil.

BY THE SLICE
Cheese Slice ................................... $3
Hot, cheesy and perfect for a quick Brooklyn bite.

Pepperoni Slice .............................. $3.50
Classic pepperoni, crisped to the edge.

Specialty Slice .............................. $4
Rotating daily specialties — ask the counter for today’s pick.

Dollar Slice .................................. $2.50
Plain cheese slice special — fast, cheap, satisfying.

WHOLE PIES
Margherita .................................... $14 / $20 (small/large) (V)
San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil and extra-virgin olive oil.

Meat Lover's ................................. $16 / $22
Pepperoni, sausage, bacon and ham piled high.

White Spinach ............................... $15 / $21 (V)
Ricotta, mozzarella and wilted spinach with a garlic-oil base.

Gluten-Free Small Pie ...................... $17 (GF)
10" gluten-free crust — same toppings, lighter crust. (limited availability)

Build Your Own Pie .......................... $10 / $15
Start with cheese, add toppings at $1.25 each (meat) — veggies $1 each.

SIDES & APPS
Garlic Knots (6) ............................ $4 (V)
Warm, buttery knots tossed in garlic and parsley with marinara for dipping.

Buffalo Wings (6) .......................... $7
Crispy wings tossed in buffalo sauce; served with ranch or blue cheese.

Mozzarella Sticks (6) ..................... $5
Golden-fried, melty center with marinara.

Side of Marinara ........................... $1.50 (V)

SALADS & EXTRAS
Caesar Salad (side) ....................... $3.50
Crisp romaine, shaved Parmesan and creamy Caesar dressing.

House Salad (side) ........................ $3 (V)
Mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumber and balsamic vinaigrette.

Extra Toppings ............................ $1.25 each (meat) / $1 each (veggies)

COMBOS & SPECIALS
Slice + Small Fountain Drink ............. $5
Any slice with a small fountain soda — quick and cheap.

Two Slices + Drink ........................ $7
Two slices and a small soda — perfect on the go.

Family Pie Deal ........................... $23
Large two-topping pie + 10 garlic knots — feeds 3–4.

Late Night Special (Mon–Thu) ............. $2.50 Slice (9pm–close)
Discounted slices for night owls.

DESSERTS & DRINKS
Cannoli ...................................... $3.50
Crisp shell filled with sweet ricotta and chocolate chips.

Chocolate Brownie .......................... $2.50
Fudgy, rich and bakery-fresh.

Fountain Soda (small) ..................... $1.75
Bottled Water ............................. $1.50

Dietary Key: (V) Vegetarian | (VG) Vegan | (GF) Gluten-Free available — ask staff

Open 7 days • Cash & Card • Delivery & Takeout • Visit us: 123 King St., Brooklyn

[Generating a high-resolution visual menu now...]

content.revised_prompt:
Create a single-page, restaurant-ready visual menu for 'Pizza King' (Pizzeria, Brooklyn, NY). Style: bold, budget-friendly pizzeria look — vintage Brooklyn deli meets modern clarity. Color palette: warm red (#C62828), creamy parchment background, black text accents, small gold highlights. Layout: vertical 8.5" x 11" portrait, clear visual hierarchy, large header with logo text 'Pizza King' and tagline 'Brooklyn's Cheap & Tasty'. Sections clearly separated with headers: Signatures, By the Slice, Whole Pies, Sides & Appetizers, Salads & Extras, Combos & Specials, Desserts & Drinks. Use simple icons for dietary indicators (V for vegetarian, VG for vegan, GF for gluten-free available). Fonts: bold condensed for headers, clean sans-serif for descriptions. Include subtle Brooklyn skyline silhouette at top background. Keep it printable and legible at 300 DPI.

Include the following menu text and prices exactly as shown, arranged with item name, price aligned to the right, and 1-2 sentence descriptions under each item.

Header: Pizza King \n Brooklyn, NY \n "Cheap. Hot. Now." \n
Signatures (label this section 'SIGNATURES — OUR BEST')
- Brooklyn Classic ................ $12 (small) / $18 (large)
  Classic thin-crust tomato, gooey mozzarella, basil and a charred crust — the slice locals crave.
- Spicy King ...................... $13 / $20
  Pepperoni, hot honey drizzle and Calabrian chili flakes for a sweet-heat Brooklyn kick.
- White Garlic Supreme ............ $12 / $18 (V)
  Ricotta, roasted garlic, mozzarella and oregano — creamy, garlicky, and oven-browned.
- Veggie Supreme .................. $11 / $17 (V)
  Bell peppers, mushrooms, red onion, spinach and house marinara — big flavor, all vegetarian.
- Buffalo Chicken King ............ $13 / $19
  Grilled chicken tossed in buffalo sauce, ranch swirl and shredded mozzarella.
- Grandma Square .................. $15 (large)
  Rustic pan pizza with thick focaccia-style crust, San Marzano sauce, fresh basil and olive oil.

By the Slice (label 'BY THE SLICE')
- Cheese Slice .................... $3
  Hot, cheesy and perfect for a quick Brooklyn bite.
- Pepperoni Slice ................ $3.50
  Classic pepperoni, crisped to the edge.
- Specialty Slice ................ $4
  Rotating daily specialties — ask the counter for today’s pick.
- Dollar Slice .................... $2.50
  Plain cheese slice special — fast, cheap, satisfying.

Whole Pies (label 'WHOLE PIES')
- Margherita ...................... $14 / $20 (small/large) (V)
  San Marzano tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil and extra-virgin olive oil.
- Meat Lover's ................... $16 / $22
  Pepperoni, sausage, bacon and ham piled high.
- White Spinach ................... $15 / $21 (V)
  Ricotta, mozzarella and wilted spinach with a garlic-oil base.
- Gluten-Free Small Pie ........... $17 (GF)
  10" gluten-free crust — same toppings, lighter crust. (limited availability)
- Build Your Own Pie ............. $10 / $15
  Start with cheese, add toppings at $1.25 each (veggies $1 each).

Sides & Appetizers (label 'SIDES & APPS')
- Garlic Knots (6) ................ $4 (V)
  Warm, buttery knots tossed in garlic and parsley with marinara for dipping.
- Buffalo Wings (6) .............. $7
  Crispy wings tossed in buffalo sauce; served with ranch or blue cheese.
- Mozzarella Sticks (6) .......... $5
  Golden-fried, melty center with marinara.
- Side of Marinara ................ $1.50 (V)

Salads & Extras (label 'SALADS & EXTRAS')
- Caesar Salad (side) ............. $3.50
  Crisp romaine, shaved Parmesan and creamy Caesar dressing.
- House Salad (side) ............. $3 (V)
  Mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumber and balsamic vinaigrette.
- Extra Toppings .................. $1.25 each (meat) / $1 each (veggies)

Combos & Specials (label 'COMBOS & SPECIALS')
- Slice + Small Fountain Drink .... $5
  Any slice with a small fountain soda — quick and cheap.
- Two Slices + Drink .............. $7
  Two slices and a small soda — perfect on the go.
- Family Pie Deal ................. $23
  Large two-topping pie + 10 garlic knots — feeds 3–4.
- Late Night Special (Mon–Thu) ... $2.50 Slice (9pm–close)
  Discounted slices for night owls.

Desserts & Drinks (label 'DESSERTS & DRINKS')
- Cannoli ........................ $3.50
  Crisp shell filled with sweet ricotta and chocolate chips.
- Chocolate Brownie .............. $2.50
  Fudgy, rich and bakery-fresh.
- Fountain Soda (small) .......... $1.75
- Bottled Water .................. $1.50

Dietary Key: (V) Vegetarian | (VG) Vegan | (GF) Gluten-Free available — ask staff

Footer: "Open 7 days • Cash & Card • Delivery & Takeout • Visit us: 123 King St., Brooklyn". Keep footer smaller but readable. Include small social icons placeholders for Instagram and Facebook.

Design notes: Align prices right, keep descriptions short and readable, ensure dietary indicators are clearly visible after item names. Use subtle separators between sections. Deliver high-resolution PNG and PDF suitable for printing.
